column4: Hi, I just upgraded to 9.10. Unfortunately, the Wi-Fi no longer works at all and the Video Card is performing below-par. In the past, I have been able to just turn on restricted drivers, but the new install doesn't seem to find any. Do I need to go somewhere and get the restricted nvidia, etc. drivers?
your answer in on the ubuntu help forums try looking for ubuntu upgrade wifi stop
for some random reason it found them this time!
Woot i have my days aswell
